kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: RIOT Reset
kw.doc: Reset the test application

kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: PHILIP Reset
kw.doc: Reset the PHiLIP MCU

kw.name: Reset Mcu
kw.doc: Resets the device

kw.name: API Firmware Data Should Match
kw.doc: Verify that the DUT runs the required API test firmware

kw.name: API Call Repeat on Timeout
kw.doc: Repeats the given API ``call`` up to 5 times on timeout.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: API Call Should Timeout
kw.doc: Fails if the given API ``call`` does not timeout.

kw.name: API Call Expect
kw.doc: Fails if the result of the given ``call`` does not match the expected outcome.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Get Metadata
kw.doc: Get the metadata of the firmware.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Resets the device

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: PHILIP Reset
kw.doc: Reset the PHiLIP MCU

kw.name: Reset Mcu
kw.doc: Resets the device

kw.name: API Sync Shell
kw.doc: Verify that the DUT runs the required API test firmware

kw.name: API Call Repeat on Timeout
kw.doc: Repeats the given API ``call`` up to 5 times on timeout.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: API Call Should Timeout
kw.doc: Fails if the given API ``call`` does not timeout.

kw.name: API Call Expect
kw.doc: Fails if the result of the given ``call`` does not match the expected outcome.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Get Metadata
kw.doc: Get the metadata of the firmware.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Measure Drift
kw.doc: Run the drift simple benchmark

kw.name: API Call Should Succeed
kw.doc: Fails if the given API ``call`` does not succeed.

kw.name: API Call Expect
kw.doc: Fails if the result of the given ``call`` does not match the expected outcome.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Resets the device

kw.name: API Sync Shell
kw.doc: Verify that the DUT runs the required API test firmware

kw.name: API Call Repeat on Timeout
kw.doc: Repeats the given API ``call`` up to 5 times on timeout.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: API Call Should Timeout
kw.doc: Fails if the given API ``call`` does not timeout.

kw.name: API Call Expect
kw.doc: Fails if the result of the given ``call`` does not match the expected outcome.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Get Metadata
kw.doc: Get the metadata of the firmware.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
